title: lee sin build help me pls
body:
hey, i'm seeing all this different builds online, but i honestly have no idea wich one to build when.
is there a simple answer like go this build when far ahead, go this one when ahead , go this one when behind, ...
Yes, i know u always have to somewhat adjust your boots for example but there must be a simpler explanation.
also, i don't understand when to pick what item as your last 3, how can i make the difference between picking {{item:3742}} and{{item:3026}} or {{item:3083}} or{{item:3143}} 
i heard u have these different builds like bruiser full tank full ad but what to build when?
I really don't know what to build when pls help.

replies.body: Honestly your best bet is to look up a bunch of guides and videos about lee sin and use all of what they say together to make a decision each game.

It changes each game based on the major factors of which champions are in the game and which are fed already.

I can give rough estimations for what items are good in what situations because I know the items well and against what champions they are good against but I don't play lee sin so I'm not gonna say in what situations you should build them (some are obvious, deadmans for roaming, ga for diving, randuins for yas, vayne, cait etc)
